## Data Wrangling

1. Create a frame with new column names

```{r}
tokyo2021 <- rename(medals, 
       country = Team.NOC,
       gold = Gold.Medal,
       silver = Silver.Medal,
       bronze = Bronze.Medal,
       rankbytotal = Rank.by.Total,
       ccode = NOCCode
              )
```


```{r}
tokyo <- as_tibble(tokyo2021)
```


## Data Viz!

```{r}
tokyo %>% 
  group_by(country) %>% 
  count(gold) %>% 
  filter(gold >= 10) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = gold, y = country)) +
  geom_bar(stat = 'identity', 
           size=1, 
           fill="coral3",) +
  geom_text(aes(label = gold),
            vjust = .50, nudge_y = .15, nudge_x = 1) +
  labs(x = "Gold Medals",
       y = "Country",
       title = "Countries with the most gold medals") +
  theme_classic()

```


```{r}
tokyo %>% 
  group_by(country) %>% 
  count(bronze, sort = TRUE) %>% 
  arrange(desc(bronze)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(bronze)) +
  geom_histogram() +
  scale_x_reverse()
```

```{r}
tokyo %>% 
  select(country, Total) %>% 
  filter(Total >= 25) %>% 
  arrange(country) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(country, Total)) +
  geom_bar(stat = 'identity')
```
